: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus thought this over. They would have to really watch Nightlight. How dare the Predacons take advantage of the situation like this.

Rodimus Prime: Being that Unicron can eat the whole planet there isn't really any refuge to take.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord::

"In our battles with the Minions, I notice two Predacons around 
base: Perceptor and  and unknow one"said Windlord"IF Unicrons wasn't 
around they could have try to capture Nighlight again and we could 
have noticed until it was late... I guess when this battle is over, 
they could do other attempt... Also, regarding that this base will 
be the first place that Unicron will attack we should have aplace 
were we can get refuge in case that we suffer a massive attack"
